milestones.title: Penn State Graduation - BS Electrical Engineering
milestones.description: Graduated from Penn State University with BS in Electrical Engineering, focus in Power Systems

milestones.title: First Full-Time Engineering Role at PPL Electric
milestones.description: Started career as Engineer in Distribution Standards at PPL Electric Utilities

milestones.title: Joined PG&E
milestones.description: Transitioned to Pacific Gas and Electric Company as Engineer in Distributed Generation Interconnection

milestones.title: PG&E's First Electric Distribution Resource Plan
milestones.description: Technical expert for developing PG&E's first Electric Distribution Resource Plan

milestones.title: Set California/U.S. Hosting Capacity Standards
milestones.description: Led efforts that set new 2015 standards for hosting capacity analysis across California and the United States

milestones.title: Promoted to Expert Engineer at PG&E
milestones.description: Promoted to Expert Engineer, Grid Innovation - technical lead for advancing integrated distribution planning processes

milestones.title: Career Transition: Engineering to Product Management
milestones.description: Joined Integral Analytics as Product Manager, transitioning from utility engineering to software product management

milestones.title: Neo4j Database Certification
milestones.description: Completed Database Clinic: Neo4J certification course

milestones.title: Promoted to VP, Product Manager
milestones.description: Promoted to Product Manager, VP at Integral Analytics - leading strategic roadmaps and product backlog

milestones.title: Graph Database Schema Implementation
milestones.description: Successfully modeled and implemented graph database schemas for electric connectivity models using Neo4j

milestones.title: LoadSEER Support Tooling Development
milestones.description: Developed comprehensive support tooling for LoadSEER's backend using Python, Azure Pipelines, and SQL
